LanguageData.HRACA_Bullet_PlasmaBR.label: plasma shot
LanguageData.HRACA_Bullet_PlasmaDMR.label: plasma shot
LanguageData.HRACA_Bullet_PlasmaPistol.label: plasma shot
LanguageData.HRACA_Bullet_PlasmaRifle.label: plasma shot

LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_BR.label: plasma battle rifle
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_BR.description: A three shot burst, long ranged, plasma battle rifle. Perfect for use against armored targets at mid range. Each shot is plasma wrapped around a small core and held in place by an energy field. The plasma is released on impact, burning the target.
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_BR.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_BR.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_BR.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_DMR.label: plasma marksman rifle
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_DMR.description: A one shot, long ranged, plasma marksman rifle. Perfect for use against armored targets at mid range. Each shot is plasma wrapped around a small core and held in place by an energy field. The plasma is released on impact, burning the target.
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_DMR.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_DMR.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_DMR.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Pistol.label: plasma quickfire pistol
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Pistol.description: A fully automatic plasma pistol. Each shot is plasma wrapped around a small core and held in place by an energy field. The plasma is released on impact, burning the target.
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Pistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Rifle.label: plasma quickfire rifle
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Rifle.description: A quickfire plasma assault rifle. Each shot is plasma wrapped around a small core and held in place by an energy field. The plasma is released on impact, burning the target.
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Rifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Shotgun.label: plasma tactical shotgun
LanguageData.HRACA_Gun_Plasma_Shotgun.description: A deadly, plasma shotgun. Each shot is plasma wrapped around tiny cores and held in place by an energy field. The plasma is released on impact, burning the target.
